My Favorite Gear in 2020

04 Jun 2020

I consider myself a minimalist. Often the topic of minimalism is focused on processes associated with how to get rid of things rather than the items that bring genuine value to an individual’s life.

In no particular order, below is a curated list of the products and services that have brought genuine value to my life in 2020.

Cycling:

  • TrainerRoad
  • Wahoo kickr smart trainer
  • Wahoo kickr headwind bluetooth fan
  • Zwift
  • zwiftpower.com

Productivity:

  • Roam Research
  • Todoist
  • Logitech keyboard
  • Logitech mouse
  • Apple Airpod Pros
  • Tiago Forte’s Blog

Clothing & Accesories:

  • a soft and breathable black tee shirt
  • a durable, stylish, and functional backpack for work

Data Science:

  • Visual Studio Code
  • alteryx
  • altair
  • Story Telling with Data by Cole Knaflic
  • Datacamp
  • Stackoverflow

Biohacking:

  • Keto Mojo ketone & glucose monitor
  • Whoop
  • Boundless by Ben Greenfield

Other:

  • Refind
  • Robinhood
  • Contigo Coffee Mug

  • EDA of 2019 Cycling Data 19 Mar 2020
